attributes.action:
Immediate stringent measures for COVID-19 containment. 
Stop wasting time.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Governement is wasting precious time to contain the COVID-19 outbreak. 
Data clearly show that the only way to stop the chain of infection is encouraging the population to self-isolate as much as possible. 
The NHS has about half the number of doctors per population and much less ITU beds than Italy - do we really want to wait and see? 
We need urgent measures now - the solution is in our hand if we want to grasp it.
attributes.background:
1) Compulsory working from home when possible - especially in London
2) Compulsory cancellation of all not urgent meetings / conferences / events 
3) Encourage people to stay at home
4) More transparent daily updates at a set time with press conference - stop the actual 24hrs delay

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300965
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397
